user_story: As a user, I want to log in so that I can access my dashboard.
test_case:
Feature: User Login
Scenario: Successful Login
Given the user is on the login page
When the user enters valid credentials
Then the user should be redirected to the dashboard

user_story: As a user, I want to reset my password so that I can regain access to my account.
test_case:
Feature: Password Reset
Scenario: Successful Password Reset
Given the user is on the password reset page
When the user enters a valid email
Then a password reset link should be sent

user_story: As an admin, I want to add a new product so that I can update the store catalog.
test_case:
Feature: Add New Product
Scenario: Successfully Adding a Product
Given the admin is on the add product page
When the admin enters valid product details
Then the product should be added to the store
